3. Global scenario

established exposure risk estimates (Diet al., 2017; Orach et al., 2021). The mortality
rate caused by ambient air pollution has contributed to 7.6% of all deaths in 2016
worldwide (Isaifan, 2020). Similarly, the WHO has also estimated that worldwide
